scripts.clean: yes | lerna run clean && lerna clean -y && rm -rf .nx && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.unlink:app-to-sdk: cd packages/sdk && yarn unlink && cd ../app && yarn unlink && cd ../..
scripts.link:app-to-sdk: cd packages/sdk && yarn link && cd ../app && yarn link @cosmic-lab/prop-shop-sdk && cd ../..
scripts.link:all: yarn link:app-to-sdk && yarn link:root-drift-vaults && yarn link:drift-vaults && yarn link:root-phoenix-vaults && yarn link:phoenix-vaults && yarn link:phoenix-vaults-program

scripts.dep:all: yarn dep:competitions && yarn dep:drift-vaults && yarn dep:drift && yarn dep:pyth && yarn dep:phoenix && yarn dep:phoenix-seat-manager && yarn dep:phoenix-vaults
